mapper.select: select student.student_id, project_management.mentor_id, project_management.project_id, project_management.Group_id, project_management.competition_id, project.project_credits as project_credits from project_management, student_group, project, student where student_group.group_id = project_management.Group_id and student_group.group_student_id = student.student_id and project.project_id = project_management.project_id and project_management.project_id = #{projectId};
